PlayerRecipes.Name: Allow Players to view recipes
PlayerRecipes.Hint:
If enabled, players can access the Crafting Recipes window and view all crafting recipes in the system. 
 Recommended - Enabled

PlayerCrafting.Name: Allow Players to Craft Items
PlayerCrafting.Hint:
If enabled, players can use the Crafting Recipes window to send items to their inventory. 
 Recommended - Disabled
PlayerCrafting.Denied: You do not have permission to craft items.

PlayerHarvesting.Name: Allow Players to access Harvesting
PlayerHarvesting.Hint:
If enabled, players can access the Harvest Creature - Harvest Controls window. 
 Recommended - Disabled

HelianasHarvest.HarvestCharacterNote: This character will receive items when you complete the harvest.
HelianasHarvest.ConfirmHarvestDialog: Are you sure you wish to send the following items to {name}?
HelianasHarvest.ChatRollCheckInstructions: Roll your combined check and enter the total into the harvest window.
HelianasHarvest.ChatComponentsInstructions: Discuss what you would like to attempt to harvest and what order. Each additional item you attempt to harvest will increase the DC.
HelianasHarvest.ChatComponentsMessage: The following items can be harvested from {creatureName}:
